title.narrative: Implementation Phase - Procurement of Services - Long & short term consultancies; Programme running costs; Programme activity costs

description.narrative: This activity (Implementation Phase - Procurement of Services - Long & short term consultancies; Programme running costs; Programme activity costs) is a component of Voices for Change: Empowering Women and Adolescent Girls Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £31,241,172. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Women's equality organisations and institutions, Social Protection, Promotion of development awareness (non-sector allocable). , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 24-08-2011 and the end date is 30-09-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
